alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:58PM CDT until August 12 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 658 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Lindsay to near Cyril to near Medicine Park, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Chickasha, Anadarko, Marlow, Lindsay, Cache, Elgin, Apache, Rush Springs, Fletcher, Cyril, Dibble, Sterling, Alex, Verden, Cement, Medicine Park, Norge, Bradley, and Meers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caddo; Comanche; Garvin; Grady; McClain; Stephens
